title: Video: Wild Nothing – A Dancing Shell
body:
Virginia based quintet Wild Nothing return with their first new material of 2013, in the form of new single A Dancing Shell.

Taken from their forthcoming EP, out later in the year, it’s toys with more psychedelic elements than Tatum & co usually experiment with, alongside the obviously Talking Heads inspired vocals. Empty Estate is out 14 May via Captured Tracks.

Empty Estate Tracklist:

*   1\. The Body In Rainfall
*   2\. Ocean Repeating (Big-eyed Girl)
*   3\. On Guyot
*   4\. Ride
*   5\. Data World
*   6\. A Dancing Shell
*   7\. Hachiko
